com.voiceclearly.api.listener
Interface CallListener

public interface CallListener

CallListener interface that is implemented by clients to receive Google voice and chat callbacks. See the examples for additional details on using this interface.

Method Summary
 void callAnswered(Call call)
          Triggered when a call is answered by the far end.
 void callDeclined(Call call, java.lang.String reason)
          Triggered when a call is declined by the far end user.
 void callDisconnected(Call call, java.lang.String reason)
          Triggered when the call is disconnected and giving a reason.
 void incomingCall(Call call)
          Triggered when a voice call arrives to the VoiceClearlyService
 void incomingIm(Chat chat, Message message)
          Triggered when an instant message is received by the VoiceClearlyService
